TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsUdtReturn extends System.Object
public ref class IsUdtReturn abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示返回类型是用户定义的类型。

span.span: Indicates that a return type is a user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C + + 编译器使用修饰符来标记具有本机 c + + 对象返回语义的方法的返回类型。The modifier is used by the C++ compiler to mark return types of methods that have native C++ object return semantics. 托管的调试器识别正确确定本机调用约定是在使用此修饰符。The managed debugger recognizes this modifier to correctly determine that the native calling convention is in use. 编译器发出元数据更改，在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值时的默认行为是不适当的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选的修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法如类， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，并组合成与文件[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个使用中的类的程序集命名空间，并发出到该程序集的修饰符。The following code example creates an assembly using classes in the namespace and emits the modifier into that assembly. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsUdtReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsUdtReturn/CPP/sample.cpp#1)]
